Characteristic.name: Analog Output

InformativeText.Summary: The Analog Output characteristic represents the value of an analog output as a 16-bit integer (uint16). The format of the analog value depends on the implementation.

Characteristic.Note: The Octet Order in the above table is in the order of LSO to MSO, where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
